sentences.english: The old man is hard of hearing.
You'll have to speak a little louder. Mrs. Evans is hard of hearing.

sentences.english: That old man is hard of hearing, so you have to shout in a loud voice when you talk to him.
sentences.chinese: 那位老先生患有重聽，所以你和他說話時要大聲地喊。

sentences.english: They much prefer to join deaf and hard of hearing together into one category.
sentences.chinese: 他們大多喜歡把聾和重聽聯在一起作爲一個範疇。

sentences.english: Listen to the recordings and identify what your voice tone communicates.
sentences.chinese: 重聽錄音並且識別你的語音聲調要表達的意思。
